synopsis.text: More adventures await the high school quartet of Yuuko, Tooru, Run, and Nagi! When their math teacher, Kitou-sensei, injures her hand, Tooru takes the opportunity to sneak her cat, Tansan, into school for a meet-and-greet with friends. The girls' love for pancakes leads them to a caf√©, where an unexpected encounter with Yutaka adds a twist to their outing. When Yuuko falls ill, her friends rally around her, showcasing their camaraderie. Join these friends as they navigate through everyday life, from a hot pot party at Tooru's house to a New Year's shrine visit, strengthening their bond with each shared experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
